/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun that shines brightly in the clear blue sky. The sun's rays create a lens flare effect, adding a touch of whimsy to the urban landscape. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a human element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
